title: Densen Complex
description:
A collection of short, bittersweet love stories, including several incestuous ones.

[*][b] 1 - Until the Ice Melts and Turns to Blood [/b]
The Karaoke staff call her "the lonely girl." She rents a room all night and won't go home. Why? And what can Nogami say to help her?

[*][b] 2 - Suicide Note[/b]
Two charming girls, Michi and Rina, decide to end their lives this day. As the day ends we slowly discover why: both the horror--and the hope.

[*][b] 3 - White[/b]
It happened once, years ago... Now it's all Minako can think about. She yearns to do it again. But how does her brother feel...?

[*][b] 4 - Yellow[/b]
She just wants her brother to look at her--really look at her as a girl, not just a sister.

[*][b] 5 - Blue[/b]
They were finally reunited after their parents divorced. She can't resist her feelings for him anymore. But will she lose everything for one night of bliss?

[*][b] 6 - Prohibition[/b]
A walk together. A stolen kiss. Tears.

[*][b] 7 - Moon River[/b]
A young man studies and studies while being afraid of his own problems of failing. Until he meets a girl with a specific problem of her own by the river...

[*][b] 8 - Bitter Cakes[/b]
Miho meets with her friend Natsuki, who is blind. Natsuki trusts her other senses--and herself. But Miho trusts no one--yet perhaps trusts her eyes a little too much...

[*][b] 9 - Love Horizon[/b]
A girl sees her high school crush by chance, but something is very different about him.

[*][b] 10 - The Day It Rained[/b]
A short political piece regarding a young man, and a doll.

[*][b] 11 - No Count[/b]
A young girl finds out that her first kiss was with her oniichan.
